title: gofmt -r crash
body:
gofmt -r 'struct { title string; body []byte } -> struct { Title string; Body []byte
}' $GOROOT/doc/codelab/wiki/final-noclosure.go

crashes; and so does:

gofmt -r 'struct { title string; body []byte } -> struct {}'
/home/gri/go0/doc/codelab/wiki/final-noclosure.go

but not:

gofmt -l -r 'struct { title string } -> struct {}'
/home/gri/go0/doc/codelab/wiki/final-noclosure.go
